customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my hobby of making rebar art. I watched a bunch of videos and decided to purchase the cutter bender. On the videos they make it look very easy to cut and bend #5 bars... but its not so easy.... #4 and #3 are much easier. Overall a great well built product and has made my art projects easier.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty, should last for years
customer_reviews.text: If you have a rebar project, you cannot live without a bender. BN products make several, but this model is great for #3 #4 #5 rebar. Already mounted on wood base. This is heavy duty and your UPS man will be happy you don't order one of these everyday. Even if you have a single project, worth it to buy long lengths from your local Steel Distributor and bend/cut to fit. Resale this any day of the week after your done. Ton of guys looking for one and glad to pay cash to get one at a discount.
customer_reviews.author: CJ in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, recommended.

customer_reviews.title: It cuts #4 and bends #4 and #5 just fine but it struggles mightily to cut #5
customer_reviews.text: It cuts #4 and bends #4 and #5 just fine but it struggles mightily to cut #5. Maybe for a beefy 20 yr old it would be OK but at 175 lbs and 5 decades, I have to literally put all my weight into it. And when it finally gives, it snaps so hard that I almost got whiplash. I ended up renting a demo saw to cut the #5. The snap ring came off one of the rollers in the second day. The roller needs something much more substantial to hold it on. Fortunately, it's an easy fix with a loop tie.

product_meta.title: BN Products MBC-16B 1 Manual Bender/Cutter, Orange
product_meta.description: When comparing similar products, the MBC-16B, Manual Bender / Cutter, cuts with less effort. The sturdy frame design is firmly mouned on a 2 X 8 X 60 wooden board ready to use.

Replaceable cutting jaws have two open slots with innovative shaped blades to prevent chipping of the jaws
